patthana7.2:1.1_0: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo
patthana7.2:1.1_1: uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya
patthana7.2:1.1_2: vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
patthana7.2:1.1_3: dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.2:1.1_4: Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya
patthana7.2:1.1_5: vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ
patthana7.2:1.1_6: dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana7.2:1.1_7: ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana7.2:1.1_8: nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā uppajjanti
patthana7.2:1.1_9: hetupaccayā. Nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto
patthana7.2:1.1_10: ca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto ca dhammā
patthana7.2:2.1: Nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana7.2:3.1: Naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
